```py
import pandas as pd

df = pd.DataFrame({
    'Name': ['Alice', 'Leah', 'Jessica', 'Kenny', 'Brad'],
    'Age': [50, 27, 22, 30, 40],
    'Salary': [100000, 154000, 120000, 78000, 88000],
    'Occupation': ['Doctor', 'Soldier', 'Doctor', 'Accountant', 'Florist']
})
```
